        Throws:

      • insertContents

        public boolean insertContents(ArrayList<SpenContentBase> contentList)
        Insert content list at current cursor position
        Parameters:
        contentList - The SpenContentBase list.
        Returns:
        True, if success.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        #insertContentUnitNext(ArrayList)}, #insertContentUnitEnd()}

      • insertContentUnit

        public boolean insertContentUnit(ArrayList<SpenContentBase> contentList)
        Insert content list at current cursor position
        If there are many contents in content list when use insertContents(ArrayList), this may cause ANR. To avoiding ANR, you can use insertContentUnit(ArrayList), insertContentUnitNext(ArrayList), insertContentUnitEnd() APIs. These three APIs are sub API of insertContents(ArrayList). insertContentUnit(ArrayList) must execute first time once.
        insertContentUnitNext(ArrayList) can execute several times.@since 5.0.0 insertContentUnitEnd() must execute last time once.
        Parameters:
        contentList - The SpenContentBase list.
        Returns:
        True, if success.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        #insertContentUnitNext(ArrayList)}, #insertContentUnitEnd()}

      • insertContentUnitNext

        public boolean insertContentUnitNext(ArrayList<SpenContentBase> contentList)
        Insert content list at current cursor position
        If there are many contents in content list when use insertContents(ArrayList), this may cause ANR. To avoiding ANR, you can use insertContentUnit(ArrayList), insertContentUnitNext(ArrayList), insertContentUnitEnd() APIs. These three APIs are sub API of insertContents(ArrayList). insertContentUnit(ArrayList) must execute first time once.
        insertContentUnitNext(ArrayList) can execute several times.@since 5.0.0 insertContentUnitEnd() must execute last time once.
        Parameters:
        contentList - The SpenContentBase list.
        Returns:
        True, if success.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        #insertContentUnit(ArrayList)}, #insertContentUnitEnd()}

      • insertContentUnitEnd

        public boolean insertContentUnitEnd()
        Insert content list at current cursor position
        If there are many contents in content list when use insertContents(ArrayList), this may cause ANR. To avoiding ANR, you can use insertContentUnit(ArrayList), insertContentUnitNext(ArrayList), insertContentUnitEnd() APIs. These three APIs are sub API of insertContents(ArrayList). insertContentUnit(ArrayList) must execute first time once.
        insertContentUnitNext(ArrayList) can execute several times.@since 5.0.0 insertContentUnitEnd() must execute last time once.
        Returns:
        True, if success.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        #insertContentUnit(ArrayList)}, #insertContentUnitNext(ArrayList)}

        public boolean removeContents(int beginIndex,
                              int beginPos,
                              int endIndex,
                              int endPos)
        Remove the specified contents
        Parameters:
        beginIndex - The index of begin content.
        beginPos - The begin position within the content.
        endIndex - The index of end content.
        endPos - The end position within the content.
        Returns:
        True, if success.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • setBold

        public boolean setBold(boolean enabled,
                       int beginIndex,
                       int beginPos,
                       int endIndex,
                       int endPos)
        Set the bold type.
        Parameters:
        enabled - enbale bold or not.
        beginIndex - The index of the first content for setting bold style.
        beginPos - The pos SpenSDoc.CursorInfo of the first content for setting bold style.
        endIndex - The index of the last content for setting task information.
        endPos - The pos SpenSDoc.CursorInfo of the last content for setting bold style.
        Since:
        5.0.0
